name: thrift
long_description:
thrift Cookbook
===============
Installs Thrift from source.


Requirements
------------
### Platforms
- Ubuntu 11.10
- CentOS 6.4

(Ubuntu 10.04 was tested but thrift would not compile cleanly)

### Cookbooks
Opscode cookbooks:

- build-essential
- java
- boost


Usage
-----
Include the Thrift recipe to install Thrift from source on your systems.

```ruby
include_recipe "thrift"
```
